detectors.description:
VestingContract.releaseToken() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VestingContractCaller.sol#361-381) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- vestingStartTime == 0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VestingContractCaller.sol#365)
	- block.timestamp >= vestingStartTime + (index * releaseInterval) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VestingContractCaller.sol#372)
